document_data.caption: A map showing Mount Phevos in the Alimir Mountains.
document_data.name: Mount Phevos
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Phevos''' was the tallest peak in the [[Alimir Mountains]].
document_data.Description:
Mt. Phevos was in the central Alimir Mountains. Its elevation was 8,500 feet (2,600 meters) above sea level. 

The towering peak was visible from 50 miles outside of [[Almraiven]]. Its west-facing cliffs were half of the carvings known as the [[Eye Tyrant Cliffs]].
document_data.History: The carvings on Mount Phevos celebrated the victory of the eye tyrants against the Calishites during the [[Third Age of Calimshan]].
